name: Civitas Nova
description:
A slightly different kind of strategy game desired? Plan and expand (in real time but with a pause function) your influence from the head of a small village with a few citizens, to the ruler of a complete empire. Build up your army, manage your citizens, expand your cities, research and conquer your enemies.

But maybe there are also peaceful solutions? Negotiate with other empires, conclude peace and trade agreements, or choose the warlike way. It's up to you.

All this happens with day and night changes and changing weather conditions which affecting your troops and production.
So be careful that your residents do not run out of food.

There is still much to discover, so be ready!
